alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 7:40PM MDT until May 14 at 3:49AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Rapid City SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... White River near Kadoka affecting Jackson County. For the White River...including White River, Kadoka, Oacoma...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Kadoka. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor Flood Stage. Pasture land will be flooded with water over both banks. This is also the level where the river begins to spread out significantly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM MDT Friday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 15.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 745 AM MDT.
